Hero.subtitle: Manages your emails, runs your calendar, tracks expenses, posts on social media ‚Äî all from a simple text message on Telegram.
Hero.subtitleSecondary: No coding. No API keys. No surprise bills. Just pick a warrior and start chatting.

ChatDemo.userMsg1: Hey Mia, check my Gmail and summarize anything urgent
ChatDemo.botMsg1: On it! You have 3 unread emails. One urgent: your flight to Orlando was changed to 6:15 AM. Want me to update your calendar and set an earlier alarm?
ChatDemo.userMsg2: Yes please, and order me an Uber for 4:30 AM
ChatDemo.botMsg2: Done ‚úì Calendar updated, alarm set for 4:00 AM, and Uber scheduled for 4:30 AM to AUS airport. Anything else?

Integrations.label: INTEGRATIONS
Integrations.title: Works With Apps You Already Use
Integrations.subtitle: Your warrior connects to 50+ apps. No setup wizards. Just tell it what you need.
Integrations.moreApps: + Uber, Todoist, Whoop, Obsidian, WordPress, and 30 more via OpenClaw skills

ValueProps.label: WHAT IT ACTUALLY DOES
ValueProps.title: One Chat. Everything Handled.
ValueProps.inbox_desc: Reads emails, drafts replies, unsubscribes from junk, and flags what matters.
ValueProps.inbox_example: "Hey, summarize my unread emails and draft a reply to the one from my landlord"
ValueProps.calendar_desc: Schedules meetings, sends reminders, and warns you about conflicts ‚Äî before you even ask.
ValueProps.calendar_example: "Move my Thursday meeting to Friday and let the team know on Slack"
ValueProps.shopping_desc: Finds the best price, tracks deals, applies coupons, and monitors price drops.
ValueProps.shopping_example: "Find me the best deal on AirPods Max and alert me if they drop below $400"
ValueProps.social_desc: Drafts posts, suggests content ideas, schedules uploads, and tracks engagement.
ValueProps.social_example: "Write 5 Instagram caption ideas for my new product launch"
ValueProps.money_desc: Monitors expenses, categorizes receipts, and gives you a weekly spending summary.
ValueProps.money_example: "How much did I spend on food this month? Show me a breakdown"
ValueProps.control_desc: Plays music, orders rides, sets alarms, and connects your smart home ‚Äî all from chat.
ValueProps.control_example: "Play my chill playlist on Spotify and save my meeting notes to Apple Notes"

HowItWorks.label: GETTING STARTED
HowItWorks.title: Live in 3 Minutes. Seriously.
HowItWorks.step1_desc: Choose a personality that fits your vibe ‚Äî work mode, creative, no-nonsense, or chill.
HowItWorks.step2_desc: One tap. Your warrior goes live in your favorite messaging app instantly.
HowItWorks.step3_desc: Text your warrior like a friend. It handles the rest ‚Äî emails, calendar, research, anything.

Testimonials.t1_text: Everything Siri was supposed to be. And it goes so much further.
Testimonials.t3_text: Named him Jarvis. Daily briefings, calendar checks, reminds me when to leave for pickleball.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.section1_body1: When you create a ClawWarriors account, we collect your email address and encrypted password. When you connect a messaging channel (Telegram or WhatsApp), we store the channel identifier needed to route messages between you and your warrior.
Privacy.section1_body2: We also collect message content sent between you and your warrior to provide conversation context and improve the experience. Messages are stored securely and associated with your account.
Privacy.section2_item1: Provide and maintain the ClawWarriors service
Privacy.section2_item2: Route messages between you and your AI warrior
Privacy.section2_item3: Maintain conversation context for personalized responses
Privacy.section2_item6: Improve our service and develop new features
Privacy.section3_intro: We use the following third-party services:
Privacy.section3_item1: NVIDIA NIMs (Kimi K2.5) ‚Äî AI model provider for generating warrior responses
Privacy.section3_item2: Telegram Bot API ‚Äî Messaging channel integration
Privacy.section3_body: These services have their own privacy policies. Message content is transmitted to our AI provider to generate responses. We do not sell your personal data to third parties.
Privacy.section4_body: Your data is stored on secure servers. Passwords are hashed using bcrypt. We use HTTPS for all data transmission. While we implement reasonable security measures, no internet transmission is 100% secure.
Privacy.section5_body: We retain your account data and message history for as long as your account is active. You can request deletion of your account and associated data by contacting us or using the account deletion option in your settings.
Privacy.section7_body: If you have questions about this privacy policy or your data, contact us at

Chat.emptyHint: Type a message below or chat on Telegram ‚Äî it all shows up here.
